speaker: Olivia
text: Hey, did you hear what Daniel announced earlier today about the deployment?
ipa: heɪ | dɪdʒə hɪɹ wʌt ˈdænjəl əˈnaʊnst ˈɝliɚ təˈdeɪ əˈbaʊt ðə dɪˈplɔɪmənt
stress: Hey | did you HEAR what DANIEL ANNOUNCED EARLIER TODAY about the DEPLOYMENT
linking:
"did you" → /dɪdʒə/ (you reduced)
"earlier today" → /ˈɝliɚ təˈdeɪ/ (linking r to to)

speaker: Lucas
text: Not fully. What did he say?
ipa: nɑt ˈfʊli | wʌt dɪd i seɪ
stress: Not FULLY | what did he SAY

speaker: Olivia
text: He informed us that the deployment window had been moved to the following day to avoid peak traffic. He reminded us that we must finish testing by tonight.
ipa: hi ɪnˈfɔɹmd əs ðət ðə dɪˈplɔɪmənt ˈwɪndoʊ həd bɪn muvd tə ðə ˈfɑloʊɪŋ deɪ tə əˈvɔɪd pik ˈtɹæfɪk | hi ɹɪˈmaɪndɪd əs ðət wi mʌst ˈfɪnɪʃ ˈtɛstɪŋ baɪ təˈnaɪt
stress: He INFORMED us that the DEPLOYMENT WINDOW had been MOVED to the FOLLOWING DAY to AVOID PEAK TRAFFIC | he REMINDED us that we MUST FINISH TESTING by TONIGHT
linking:
"had been" → /həd bɪn/ (reduction)
"moved to" → /muvd tə/ (link d to to)

speaker: Lucas
text: Did he explain why the schedule changed?
ipa: dɪd i ɪkˈspleɪn waɪ ðə ˈskɛʤuˌəl ʧeɪndʒd
stress: Did he EXPLAIN why the SCHEDULE CHANGED

speaker: Olivia
text: Yeah, he explained that the product team had requested extra QA time after finding a bug this morning.
ipa: jæ | hi ɪkˈspleɪnd ðət ðə ˈpɹɑdəkt tim həd ɹɪˈkwɛstɪd ˈɛkstɹə ˈkjuˈeɪ taɪm ˈæftɚ ˈfaɪndɪŋ ə bʌɡ ðɪs ˈmɔɹnɪŋ
stress: Yeah | he EXPLAINED that the PRODUCT TEAM had REQUESTED EXTRA QA TIME after FINDING a BUG this MORNING
linking:
"had requested" → /həd ɹɪˈkwɛstɪd/ (reduction)
"finding a bug" → /ˈfaɪndɪŋ ə bʌɡ/ (linking ing + a)

speaker: Lucas
text: That makes sense. Did he ask if we could join the final review meeting later today?
ipa: ðæt meɪks sɛns | dɪd i æsk ɪf wi kəd ʤɔɪn ðə ˈfaɪnəl ɹɪˈvju ˈmitɪŋ ˈleɪtɚ təˈdeɪ
stress: That MAKES SENSE | did he ASK if we could JOIN the FINAL REVIEW MEETING LATER TODAY
linking:
"could join" → /kəd ʤɔɪn/ (smooth link)
"later today" → /ˈleɪtɚ təˈdeɪ/ (r + to)

speaker: Olivia
text: He invited us to join at 4 PM. He also wanted to know whether we had updated the rollback plan already.
ipa: hi ɪnˈvaɪtɪd əs tə ʤɔɪn ət fɔɹ piˈɛm | hi ˈɔlsoʊ ˈwɑntɪd tə noʊ ˈwɛðɚ wi həd ˈʌpˌdeɪtɪd ðə ˈɹoʊlbæk plæn ɔlˈɹɛdi
stress: He INVITED us to JOIN at 4 PM | he ALSO WANTED to KNOW whether we had UPDATED the ROLLBACK PLAN ALREADY
linking:
"wanted to know" → /ˈwɑntɪd tə noʊ/ (to reduced)
"had updated" → /həd ˈʌpˌdeɪtɪd/ (d to updated)

speaker: Olivia
text: I admitted that we were still working on it but promised that it would be ready before the meeting.
ipa: aɪ ædˈmɪtɪd ðət wi wɚ stɪl ˈwɝkɪŋ ɑn ɪt | bət ˈpɹɑməst ðət ɪt wəd bi ˈɹɛdi bɪˈfɔɹ ðə ˈmitɪŋ
stress: I ADMITTED that we were STILL WORKING on it | but PROMISED that it would be READY BEFORE the MEETING
linking:
"working on" → /ˈwɝkɪŋ ɑn/ (ng to vowel)
"would be" → /wəd bi/ (reduction)

speaker: Lucas
text: Good. Did Daniel mention anything about communication with users?
ipa: ɡʊd | dɪd ˈdænjəl ˈmɛnʃən ˈɛniˌθɪŋ əˈbaʊt kəˌmjunəˈkeɪʃən wɪð ˈjuzɚz
stress: Good | did DANIEL MENTION anything about COMMUNICATION with USERS
linking:
"about communication" → /əˈbaʊt kəˌmjunəˈkeɪʃən/ (t to vowel)
"with users" → /wɪð ˈjuzɚz/ (smooth)

speaker: Olivia
text: He said that the marketing team would send out notifications the next morning. He advised us on being ready for support requests that afternoon.
ipa: hi sɛd ðət ðə ˈmɑɹkɪtɪŋ tim wəd sɛnd aʊt ˌnoʊtəfɪˈkeɪʃənz ðə nɛkst ˈmɔɹnɪŋ | hi ædˈvaɪzd əs ɑn ˈbiɪŋ ˈɹɛdi fɚ səˈpɔɹt ɹɪˈkwɛsts ðət ˌæftɚˈnun
stress: He SAID that the MARKETING TEAM would SEND OUT NOTIFICATIONS the NEXT MORNING | he ADVISED us on BEING READY for SUPPORT REQUESTS that AFTERNOON
linking:
"send out" → /sɛnd aʊt/ (d links)
"being ready" → /ˈbiɪŋ ˈɹɛdi/ (ng to vowel)

speaker: Lucas
text: Got it. According to the status page, everything should be operational throughout the deployment.
ipa: ɡɑt ɪt | əˈkɔɹdɪŋ tə ðə ˈstætəs peɪdʒ | ˈɛvɹiˌθɪŋ ʃəd bi ˌɑpɚˈeɪʃənəl θɹuˈaʊt ðə dɪˈplɔɪmənt
stress: Got it | according to the STATUS PAGE | everything SHOULD BE OPERATIONAL throughout the DEPLOYMENT
linking:
"should be" → /ʃəd bi/ (reduction)
"throughout the" → /θɹuˈaʊt ðə/ (t to the)

speaker: Olivia
text: Yeah, but apparently support might receive some tickets if there’s any minor downtime.
ipa: jæ | bət əˈpɛɹəntli səˈpɔɹt maɪt ɹɪˈsiv səm ˈtɪkɪts ɪf ðɛɹz ˈɛni ˈmaɪnɚ ˈdaʊnˌtaɪm
stress: Yeah | but APPARENTLY SUPPORT might RECEIVE some TICKETS if there’s ANY MINOR DOWNTIME
